<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: Iterator<Entry<Integer, Integer>> iter = list.iterator();
while (iter.hasNext()) {
Entry<Integer, Integer> entry = iter.next();
// do some stuff with entry
}
<<<explanation>>>: You should use the iterator of the LinkedList to iterate through it. Casting it to a Map or HashMap is not necessary and can cause a ClassCastException.
